ieee.title: Effect of data representations on deep learning in fall detection
ieee.displayText: Branka Jokanovic, Moeness G. Amin, Fauzia Ahmad, "Effect of data representations on deep learning in fall detection", Sensor Array and Multichannel Signal Processing Workshop (SAM) 2016 IEEE, pp. 1-5, 2016, ISSN 2151-870X.

ieee.title: Effects of range spread and aspect angle on radar fall detection
ieee.displayText: Baris Erol, Moeness Amin, "Effects of range spread and aspect angle on radar fall detection", Sensor Array and Multichannel Signal Processing Workshop (SAM) 2016 IEEE, pp. 1-5, 2016, ISSN 2151-870X.

ieee.title: Fall motion detection using combined range and Doppler features
ieee.displayText: Baris Erol, Moeness G. Amin, "Fall motion detection using combined range and Doppler features", Signal Processing Conference (EUSIPCO) 2016 24th European, pp. 2075-2080, 2016, ISSN 2076-1465.

ieee.title: Radar fall motion detection using deep learning
ieee.displayText: Branka Jokanovic, Moeness Amin, Fauzia Ahmad, "Radar fall motion detection using deep learning", Radar Conference (RadarConf) 2016 IEEE, pp. 1-6, 2016, ISSN 2375-5318.
